 import { ActivatedRoute, Router, RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; import { MovieService } from './../movie.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { IMovie } from '../movie'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent { movieList: IMovie[] = []; constructor( private service: MovieService, private router: Router ){} ngOnInit() : void{ this.service.getMovies().subscribe((movieList) => { this.movieList = movieList; }); } OnEditMovie(id: number): void{ const editUrl = '/movies/edit/' + id; this.router.navigate([editUrl]); } OnDeleteMovie(id: number){ if(confirm("Do you really wanna delete this movie?")){ this.service.deleteMovies(id).subscribe(); } } }
